import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' import VideoCard from '../VideoCard/VideoCard' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { response : [] } componentDidMount() { axios.get('https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/playlist') .then((response) => { this.setState({ response : response.data }) }) } render() { return(
{this.state.response.map((item) => { console.log(item) // })}
) } } export default PlayerSection
